## User Story

**When I want to** [circumstance/goal],  
**I can** [action/capability],  
**so that** [outcome/benefit].

**Related JTBD**: [e.g., JTBD-1, JTBD-2, or link to docs/requirements/jobs-to-be-done.md]  
**Related User Story**: [e.g., US-1.1, or link to docs/requirements/user-stories.md]

---

## Problem / Need

Describe the problem this feature solves or the need it addresses. What pain point are users experiencing?

---

## Proposed Solution

Describe the feature you'd like to see implemented. Include:
- High-level description
- Key functionality
- User interaction flow
- Any UI considerations

Clear, testable criteria that define when this feature is complete:

- [ ] Criterion 1
- [ ] Criterion 2
- [ ] Criterion 3
- [ ] Works on mobile (responsive)
- [ ] Includes tests
- [ ] Accessibility requirements met

## Definition of Done

- [ ] Feature implemented according to acceptance criteria
- [ ] Unit tests written and passing
- [ ] Integration tests written (if applicable)
- [ ] Code reviewed and approved
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] Deployed to staging and tested
- [ ] Product owner / stakeholder approval
